RelatedSentence: A Pine Bluff man was fatally shot after a gunman chased him out of his apartment Sunday night and opened fire , authorities said .
A Pine Bluff man was fatally shot after a gunman chased him out of his apartment Sunday night and opened fire , authorities said .
A Pine Bluff man was fatally shot after a gunman chased him out of his apartment Sunday night and opened fire , authorities said .

James Green , 56 , died at Jefferson Regional Medical Center after being shot multiple times outside his residence at Linden Street apartments , 1020 S. Linden St. Pine Bluff police say Green 's daughter reported that an unknown man entered Green 's apartment about 9:30 p.m. , and demanded cigarettes and money .

Linden St. Pine Bluff police say Green 's daughter reported that an unknown man entered Green 's apartment about 9:30 p.m. , and demanded cigarettes and money .

James Green , 56 , died at Jefferson Regional Medical Center after being shot multiple times outside his residence at Linden Street apartments , 1020 S. Linden St. Pine Bluff police say Green 's daughter reported that an unknown man entered Green 's apartment about 9:30 p.m. , and demanded cigarettes and money .
A fight ensued , during which the daughter was struck with a pistol , the Pine Bluff Police Department said in a news release .
Green then entered the apartment from outside before being chased out by the gunman , who opened fire on Green in the parking lot , police said .
